entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
